akas: Mission Force One USA (third season title)
akas from release info: Mission Force One USA (third season title)

1.title: The Great Space Train Robbery/Mission Pets One
1.plot: When the Solar Express is stolen, Miles and Loretta must sneak aboard to get it back on track. Miles must work with five unprepared robot-pets to stop Nemesystems.

2.title: Villain After Villain/The Discover-Bot Takeover
2.plot: Gadfly Garnett offers to reveal a secret Nemesystems factory's location if Mission Force One can protect him. Nemesystems reprograms the Discover-Bots to become robot thieves!

3.title: Invaders from Tomorrowland/Rise of the Mountain Crushers
3.plot: While retrieving a TTA probe, Miles and Blodger are captured by the planet's inhabitants. The team must race to stop giant robots from destroying the Tomorrowland Mission Center.

4.title: Battle for the Zenith/Mission Force Plus One
4.plot: When a Nemesystems' expert thief steals the Zenith, Mission Force One must catch their starship and retake it. During the TTA Open House, an alien kid stows away on the starship.

5.title: The Magsteeds of Infurnia
5.plot: Mission Force One investigates suspicious Nemesystems activity on an overheated planet hoping to save its native creatures.

6.title: Stranded in Space/Plant Transplant
6.plot: After receiving a distress call, Miles and Haruna must rescue a crewmember before their ship is pulled into a star. The team brings a much-needed fruit tree to a new TTA territory.

7.title: How to Build a Better Villain/The Goopopolis Swindle
7.plot: After Miles creates a video game villain, she takes on a life of her own and traps the team inside the game! Mission Force One must track down a precious statue after it's stolen.

8.title: Bots of Fury/The Accidental Captives
8.plot: When their shuttle is stolen by Nemesystems, Watson and Crick become trapped inside! Mission Force One is tasked with testing a squad of martial arts training robots.

9.title: The Junk Monster of Planet Crunkle/The Lost Empire
9.plot: Chunks of tech self-assemble into a junk robot and take over the recycling center! Mission Force One and Queen Gemma join forces to save her people from Nemesystems.

10.title: Face-Off/The Big Escape
10.plot: After Zeno's A.I. drive is stolen, Blodger poses as the entire team to get it back. The team discovers their ship has become a gift to an alien kid and must find a way to escape.

11.title: Grendel's Moving Castle/The Great Gadfly
11.plot: Video game villain Grendel takes over Planet Alarbus and Mission Force One must win it back. Gadfly Garnett becomes a beloved superhero to the People of the Peaks.

12.title: Shoom Balla Boom/Friend or FoeBot
12.plot: Miles teams up with space trader Dashiell Scamp to steal back his teleporting jump-coat. Mission Force One comes to the aid of a planet whose inhabitants are afraid of robots.

13.title: Deep Trouble/Double Trouble
13.plot: When Commander Nemex tries to steal a cloaking device, Mission Force One rushes to save its creator: Mirandos' father! Nemex uses robotic body doubles to steal a device.

14.title: Malison to the Rescue/The Last Guardian
14.plot: When Loretta's robo-monkey lands in enemy territory, Mission Force One teams up with a space thief to save her. Mission Force One works to save a powerful android from Nemesystems.

15.title: Sidekicks for Hire/The Illumin-Aliens
15.plot: When Commander S'Leet's sidekicks are recruited by Nemesystems, Mission Force One helps rescue them. The team rescues aliens whose special abilities help thwart a Nemesystems plot.

16.title: Villain Force One/Villain Force Two
16.plot: After Commander Nemex captures most of the Mission Force One crew, Miles must work with the galaxy's top villains to rescue his teammates!

17.title: The Suit Pursuit/Operation Groovestar
17.plot: Bootjet Groovestar helps Mission Force One get their SpaceJets back. Aggro steals the team's mission suits to pose as them during a heist!

18.title: The Space Station Situation
18.plot: When a portal to the past opens up, Mission Force One teams up with real NASA astronauts to save the International Space Station from getting stuck in the future!

19.title: Aggro's Jam/Sea Change
19.plot: While on a planet that makes everyone sing, Aggro tries to capture Mission Force One. A fleet of Nemesystems ships endanger a water-covered planet with malfunctioning engines.

20.title: Saving Silas/Attack of the Arachno-Bots
20.plot: Over-confident TTA cadet Silas sees the power of teamwork when Mission Force One joins him for a rescue mission. Nemesystems sends an invasion of robot spiders to an alien planet!

21.title: The Nemesystems Takeover
21.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Runaway Shuttle/Surfin' the Whirlpool
1.plot: Miles and Merc volunteer to rescue a trapped pilot before his ship crashes into Jupiter's fiery moon. While on a father son surfing trip, Miles and Leo escape the Zuma Whirlpool.

2.title: Ocean in Motion/Explorer Exchange
2.plot: The Callisto family must figure out why a probe has water damage. An enthusiastic alien Blodger Blopp visits the Callisto family as part of a Cosmic Explorers exchange program.

3.title: Game On/How I Saved My Summer Vacation
3.plot: Miles' skill at the game of Galaxis becomes crucial to the Callisto family's survival. While vacationing on the dry planet of Alarbus, Miles and Loretta uncover an ancient secret.

4.title: Journey to the Frozen Planet/Attack of the Flickorax
4.plot: While on a mission to retrieve a frozen rover, Miles must save Loretta. When the lights go out at a charging station, Miles and Loretta must save their ship from Flickorax aliens.

5.title: Catch That IOTA!/Mighty MERC
5.plot: Leo's latest gadget sends a diplomatic dinner into complete chaos! Merc worries that his place with the Callisto family is threatened when they try out a new robot named Axel.

6.title: Who Stole the Stellosphere/Rock N' Roll
6.plot: Master space thief Gadfly Garnett sneaks onboard the Stellosphere and blasts away with it! When a moonquake traps the Callistos behind a rockslide, Miles and Merc must save them.

7.title: Happy Captain's Day/Planet of the Plants
7.plot: During a mission to Antheia, the Callistos discover something even stranger than the plants. Miles, Loretta and Leo want to give Captain Phoebe the best Captain's Day ever!

8.title: Downsized/Ride of the Quarkons
8.plot: The Callistos encounter a pod of Quarkons blocking the Photon Superhighway. A shrunken Callisto family must work together to help Merc save an off-course starship.

9.title: To the Goldilocks Zone/Hiccup in the Plan
9.plot: Miles helps scout for a new planet that'll be "just right" for his Earth friend Haruna. The Callistos go from launch to lunch when a giant Sporjot alien swallows the Stellosphere.

10.title: On Spaceguard/Spaceship Invader
10.plot: Miles goes on a ride with his uncle, Captain Joe of the SpaceGuard, and helps foil space villain Gadfly Garnett. A fuzzy rock Miles bring homes may not be a fuzzy rock after all!

11.title: Adventures in Robot-Pet Sitting/The Great Blastboard Chase
11.plot: It's mayhem when the Callistos transport some robo-animals to the Tethosphere. When Miles borrows Leo's Blastboard without permission, things go from bad to Alien-Dinosaur-bad!

12.title: Unplugged/Junked
12.plot: When the StarJetter crash lands on an uninhabited planet, the Callistos must survive without technology. The Callistos must track down a culprit dumping trash into orbit.

13.title: Mama Merc/Space Race
13.plot: Miles must help his family when a creature mistakes the StarJetter for its egg. Miles enters the Tomorrowland Pilot of the Future race and discovers friends are priceless.

14.title: The Neptune Adventure/Eye to Eye
14.plot: A field trip to Neptune goes bottoms up when the station flips over and sinks.The Callistos encounter Spectryx, an alien who can only see in the infrared spectrum.

15.title: Yuri's Night/I, Stella
15.plot: On Yuri's Night, the Callistos must bring alien musician Bootjet Groovestar to the Tethoscape. Stella experiences a technical malfunction and Miles must help get her groove back.

16.title: Frozen Food/Later, Multivator
16.plot: The Callisto's family dinner is interrupted by Gadfly Garnett! Miles tries to follow in his dad's "Fix-It" footsteps, but mistakenly modifies the Stellosphere's Multivator.

17.title: Lunar New Year/The Hoverbike Diaries
17.plot: Leo and Captain Joe head out for their annual hoverbike road trip, and invite Miles for the first time. Miles' grandparents journey to outer space for the Lunar New Year.

18.title: The Search for Skellig Ro/Endangered Species
18.plot: Miles and Loretta meet Master Skellig Ro, a legendary guru in the alien martial art of Naxos. The Callistos must find a way to save a group of dangerous creatures.

19.title: Blasteroid/Magnetic Merc
19.plot: The Callistos discover a tiny race of creatures living inside the asteroids. Merc goes from dodging silverware to dodging asteroids when he accidentally becomes magnetized.

20.title: A Growing Problem/The Tardigrade Escapade
20.plot: The Callistos use mechanized robots to save a planet from an invasive species of moss. The Callistos track down and save a massive Tardigrade.

21.title: Miles vs. The Volcano/Scavengers of Mars
21.plot: The Callistos head to Mars to witness a volcano eruption and Miles' aunt goes missing! A scavenger hunt turns into a rescue mission when Miles' friend Rygan goes missing.

22.title: Unexpected Ally/Skyrise
22.plot: The Callistos find an unexpected ally in space thief Gadfly Garnett. At the opening of Alarbus' new space elevator, the first ride may be the last when the elevator malfunctions.

23.title: Ghost Moon/Stormy Night in a Dark Nebula
23.plot: The Callistos are sent to investigate eerie sightings on a dark moon. The Callistos enter a dark nebula and find some spooky inhabitants.

24.title: Dino World/Team Exo-Flex
24.plot: An Exo-Flex training session becomes complicated for Miles and his friends. The Callistos search for the missing Professor Rubicon, who was last seen researching ancient dinosaur fossils.

25.title: The Pluto Rescue/The Taking of the Solar Express
25.plot: Miles, Loretta, and Aunt Frida get more adventure than they bargained for on their trip to Pluto. Miles and Haruna must stop Gadfly Garnett from pulling off a galactic heist.

26.title: The Space Trader/The Quantum Cup
26.plot: Merc volunteers to act as bait to catch a robot thief. When disaster strikes during the Quantum Cup, the kids and coaches realize some things are more important than winning.

27.title: The Legend of the Sandelion/The Mystery of Atlantix
27.plot: The Callistos travel to Sandrosk to save a colony from a sandstorm. The Callistos are sent to Pipp's hometown of Atlantix, but their mission is interrupted by an oceanic menace.

28.title: Escape from the Tethoscape/The Hitchhiker's Ride Through the Galaxy
28.plot: When the Stellosphere is out of commission, Miles and Loretta call on their friends for help. Mayhem ensues when the Callistos bring aboard a group of mischievous critters.

29.title: The Discovery Expedition/Snow Globe
29.plot: The Callistos' Christmas trip is interrupted by a villain named S'leet who causes it to snow inside the Tethoscape! Loretta discovers a hidden planet full of snow and ice.

30.title: Galactech: Secrets of the Black Hole
30.plot: When a black hole reveals a clue left by an ancient alien race, the Callistos discover a secret galaxy containing the key to saving their own.

1.title: Galactech: Captain Miles/The Search for Spot
1.plot: Miles thinks he's ready to be captain, but he's put to the test when his family is in danger. The Callistos discover an alien toddler that has adopted a robot as a beloved pet.

2.title: The Blobbysitters/Astro-Cavers
2.plot: Miles and Blodger babysit the Blopp twins. Miles' eagerness to go Astro-caving with the Cosmic Explorers makes him overlook his preparations.

3.title: Galactech: How to Build a Robot-Pet/Career Day
3.plot: With Miles' help, Blodger learns to appreciate his new robot-pet for what it CAN do instead of being disappointed in what it CAN'T do. Miles' Career Day mail run with Mr. Xylon becomes a race against time to deliver a very important package.

4.title: Galloping Groundshakers/Galactech: March of the Robo-Penguins
4.plot: The Callistos' creature-riding adventure becomes a race to save a rare species. Miles and Mirandos corral a group of robo-penguins back home after they get lost in a blizzard.

5.title: The Adventures of Jet Retrograde/The Tiny Aliens
5.plot: Miles and Haruna's toy rockets inadvertently create problems for a colony of tiny aliens. Miles makes a superhero movie as a birthday present for his dad.

6.title: Galactech: The Galactech Grab/Galactech: An Admiral Rescue
6.plot: When Gadfly steals the Galactech Globe, the Callistos pursue him to his home planet. Miles uses Naxos to free Watson and Crick after they lock themselves in a high-security lab.

7.title: Galaxias Quest/Galactech: Mission to the Sun
7.plot: When Miles unlocks a secret level in his holo-game, he enters a mysterious world.The Callistos try to get Stella back after her probe gets lost in the Sun.

8.title: The First Day of Galactic School/Miles Underwater
8.plot: At the Galactech Fair, Miles demonstrates Leo's new Exo-Flex-X suit. The Cosmic Explorers are on a mission to stop Gadfly from stealing the Young Inventors Pavilion!

9.title: The Galactic Fair/Unfair Getaway
9.plot: At the Galactech Fair, Miles demonstrates Leo's new Exo-Flex-X suit. The Cosmic Explorers are on a mission to stop Gadfly from stealing the Young Inventors Pavilion!

10.title: Building Day/Galactech: Flight of the Iotas
10.plot: Miles and Haruna's self-built vehicles cause the Cosmic Explorers to get trapped! Miles must stop a swarm of IOTA helper bots from taking over the Stellosphere!

11.title: Galactech: Still Rocketing/Merc's Night Out
11.plot: Miles invites his grandparents on a mission to retrieve their long lost starship. After a maintenance reboot, Merc accidentally sleep-rockets to a planet where robots don't exist!

12.title: Space Junkers/Help Us, Jet Retrograde!
12.plot: Miles and Leo's scavenging trip turns into a mission to help a lost robot. Miles learns his homemade movies are a success on an alien planet where they think the superhero is real!

13.title: Blackout on Bloppsburgh/The Robot Thief
13.plot: When Bloppsburgh loses power, Blodger and the Callistos must find a way to fix it.Miles and the Cosmic Explorers' first TTA mission goes awry when Construction Bots are swiped!

14.title: Back in the Groove/Saving Lumaro
14.plot: Rockstar Bootjet Groovestar joins the Callistos on a mission to try to find his groove again. When Gadfly goes to drill for Staridium on Lumaro, the Callistos must stop him!

15.title: Galactech: The S'Leet Heist/Galactech: The S'Leet Fleet
15.plot: When Commander S'Leet uses the Idea Hall to find a second Galactech Globe, it's up to Miles, Loretta, and Blodger to try to stop him.

16.title: Once in a Blue Moon/The Queen Gemma Dilemma
16.plot: Miles and his Cosmic Explorers go rafting on an alien planet to earn a holo-badge. Queen Gemma leads the Cosmic Explorers on a bird watching hike that doesn't go according to plan.

17.title: Galactech: The Mystery of the Dinosuars
17.plot: When a planet full of dinosaurs is threatened by an asteroid, Miles and his family must unravel ancient secrets to save them.

18.title: Who Stole the Dinosaur?/Nine Minutes 'Til Bedtime
18.plot: Space Trader Dashiell Scamp needs the Callistos' help getting a dino off his ship. When the Stellosphere goes haywire, Miles and Loretta must fix it before their parents come home.

19.title: Chasing the Stormchaser/Galactech: Loretta's Lost BraceLex
19.plot: Miles and Loretta interview a stormchaser but soon become part of the story! When Loretta can't go on a school field trip, Miles volunteers to collect data for her BraceLex.

20.title: Gamechangers/Goon Baby Goon
20.plot: Miles and Loretta learn how to create their own holo-game. Gadfly's tinkering in the Stellosphere's Solidizer creates a Baby Goon, a toddling terror that threatens the ship!

21.title: Beneath Europa/Callistos on Ice
21.plot: The Callistos go on an expedition to Jupiter's moon Europa. S'Leet freezes the Stellosphere in solid ice to steal the Arkstar.

22.title: Galactech: The Space Trader Strikes Back; Galactech: The Vanishing Callistos
22.plot: Dashiell Scamp uses a robot decoy of Watson & Crick to fool the Callistos for a heist. When the Callistos start disappearing one-by-one, Miles and Blodger must find them!

23.title: Galactech: The Search for the Plectrix; Robo-Monkey Business
23.plot: Miles goes on a quest to find a lost musical instrument for his grandfather's birthday. After being stranded, Miles, Loretta and Merc get help from a robo-monkey.

24.title: Connect & Protect
24.plot: When Miles, Loretta, Haruna, Blodger and Mirandos complete their final Cosmic Explorer badge, they are promoted to the Mission Academy!

imdb.title: Miles from Tomorrowland
plot: Follows the outer space voyages of young adventurer Miles and his family.::Disney Junior
